extendedInfo.description: The Family Medical Officer application from El Camino Hospital, the Hospital of Silicon Valley, provides instant access to several valuable healthcare services and information, including:EMERGENCY RESPONSE: Current wait times for our emergency rooms in Mountain View, California and Los Gatos, California. View a handy checklist of things to bring if you do have to visit the ER, or dial 911 with the touch of a button.FIND A DOCTOR: Whether you need a general practitioner or a specialist, you'll find some of the best physicians in Silicon Valley here. Search by name, specialty, or location.MY FAMILY & ME: Keep track of your family's medical history for diagnosis and information purposes in this password-protected tool.ECH RESOURCES: A comprehensive health library, a drug reference, and a health encyclopedia, all at your fingertips.VISITING ECH: Get turn-by-turn directions to our facilities, campus maps, visiting hours and other useful information.ECH NEWS & EVENTS: Get the most up-to-date news via our RSS feed, our Facebook posts, and our Twitter feed in this tool.

reviews.title: Will take it wherever I go
reviews.comment: Nice start.  My favorite feature is the ER wait times, and they seem up to date (usually within 10-15 minutes).  The Medical Library seems helpful too with a lot of information, but this appears to make the search slower than expected.  The \"My Family & Me\" is a nice touch to store important information you might need while traveling such as health conditions, medications, etc, but part of me wishes I didn\'t have to login to get to that (Although I understand the security risk).  Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User
